100% Placement

A master barber course covers the most advanced techniques in hair cutting, styling, grooming, shaving, and business management. Students get extensive hands-on training with real clients to hone their skills and perfect their craft. Graduates will have the skills and knowledge to be leaders in this industry.

Features:

  • -20 weeks above
  • -Hair Cutting & Beard setting (Unisex)
  • -Advances Hair color, Straightening (Unisex)
  • -Facial

FAQ'S

1. Is there a prerequisite for enrolling in an master barber training course?

Yes, typically students are required to have prior experience working as a barber or have completed an advanced barber training program.
